duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service including answering phones, greeting donors, and ensuring the safety of donors and the team.
Screen new and repeat donors, take and record donor vital signs, and maintain accurate records.
Identify operational opportunities for continuous improvement and coordinate donor compensation.
Ensure a clean and professional work environment, attend team meetings, and problem-solve together.
Work a variety of shifts including weekends and holidays, and learn to operate plasmapheresis machines to ensure donor safety.
